profile.biography: I'm a full stack software developer. I've worked on everything ranging from building RESTful APIs, to backend ingestion services, to even a bit of front end javascript

careers.title: W2O Group
careers.description: Worked on several projects ranging from a college football recruiting app, and a handful of interactive social metric driven dashboards, to my current role as maintainer of all things backend

careers.title: MyEdu
careers.description: MyEdu is a platform designed to help college students choose college courses based on professor reviews and grade distributions, eventually building them an online performance resume with skills, degree information, and proficiencies. The site also has an employer login and a tool to match candidates for particular job based on skills, degrees, and schools of choice.

projects.title: MyEdu
projects.description: A tool dedicated to helping college students finish college in four years and get a job in their field.
projects.tags: Zend Framework, proprietary RESTful backend, MySQL, PHP

projects.title: The Playing Field
projects.description: A college football recruiting app dedicated to monitor recruits' outside of football life

projects.title: Footprint
projects.description: Dashboard to show high level corporate online social footprint

projects.title: Pathfinder
projects.description: Dashboard software that allows analysts deep dive into corporate online social media

projects.title: Dim Sum
projects.description: Internal analyst toolkit built to give analysts the tools to guide fortune 100 companies' online decisions.
projects.tags: Development, Java, Angular, Elasticsearch, Apache Streams
